explorations.search_hint: Analyze the detailed implementation of popup form save/load logic
explorations.summary: popup.ts의 설정 폼(form) 저장/로드 로직에 대한 완전한 분석. 8개 필드(GitHub/GitLab 토큰, GitLab URL, LLM 설정, UI 제어)의 메타데이터, AES-GCM 암호화 흐름, 코드 반복 패턴, 에러 처리, 엣지 케이스를 포함한 상세 문서화.
patterns: AES-GCM 256-bit encryption with PBKDF2 key derivation
pain_points: Empty token handling undefined (no explicit deletion)
Decryption failure silent failure (console.warn only, no UI feedback)
Code repetition in token encryption/decryption (4 similar blocks)
Performance: No key caching (PBKDF2 100K iterations per operation)
Extension reinstall breaks all encrypted data (no migration strategy)
